model_solution:
To compute the determinant of the given 3x3 matrix, we can use the formula:

\[\begin{vmatrix} a & b & c \\ d & e & f \\ g & h & i \end{vmatrix} = a(ei - fh) - b(di - fg) + c(dh - eg).\]

In the given matrix, a = 2, b = 0, c = -1, d = 7, e = 4, f = -3, g = 2, h = 2, and i = 5.

Substituting these values into the formula, we get:

\[\begin{vmatrix} 2 & 0 & -1 \\ 7 & 4 & -3 \\ 2 & 2 & 5 \end{vmatrix} = 2(4 \cdot 5 - (-3) \cdot 2) - 0(7 \cdot 5 - (-3) \cdot 2) + (-1)(7 \cdot 2 - 4 \cdot 2).\]

Expanding and simplifying, we get:

\[\begin{vmatrix} 2 & 0 & -1 \\ 7 & 4 & -3 \\ 2 & 2 & 5 \end{vmatrix} = 2(20 + 6) - 0(35 + 6) - (14 - 8).\]

Continuing to simplify, we get:

\[\begin{vmatrix} 2 & 0 & -1 \\ 7 & 4 & -3 \\ 2 & 2 & 5 \end{vmatrix} = 2(26) - 0(41) - 6.\]

Finally, we get:

\[\begin{vmatrix} 2 & 0 & -1 \\ 7 & 4 & -3 \\ 2 & 2 & 5 \end{vmatrix} = 52 - 6 = 46.\]

The determinant of the given matrix is 46.
